text: Thyasidae is a family of mites in the order Trombidiformes. There are about 7 genera and more than 30 described species in Thyasidae. ==Genera== These nine genera belong to the family Thyasidae: * Euthyas Piersig, 1898 * Thyas Dall, 1900 * Thyasides Lundblad, 1926 * Thyopsella Cook, 1955 * Thyopsis Piersig, 1899 * Trichothyas Viets, 1926 * Zschokkea Koenike, 1892 ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:Trombidiformes
title: Thyasidae
